# setIsVisible(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the window’s visible state to the value you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setIsVisible(_ flag: Bool)
```

## Setting Scripting Attributes

- **setIsMiniaturized(_:)**: Sets the window’s miniaturized state to the value you specify.
- **setIsZoomed(_:)**: Sets the window’s zoomed state to the value you specify.
